blog.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest news and discover the best tourist attractions in Serra Negra.
blog.intro: Serra Negra offers experiences for every traveler: city viewpoints and icons — Alto da Serra, Cable Car to Christ the Redeemer, and the Trevi Fountain replica — plus rural tourism on visiting farms. There you can follow artisanal production of wines and cachaças (Família Silotto), coffee from planting to roasting (Vale do Ouro Verde), farm-made cheeses (Sítio Chapadão), and spirits and rustic sweets (Sítio Bom Retiro – Família Carra). Advance booking recommended.

alto-da-serra.title: Alto da Serra (Serra Negra)
alto-da-serra.description: Get ready for a breathtaking view at Alto da Serra, the highest point in the region at an altitude of 1,310m! From there, you can contemplate one of the most beautiful landscapes of the Water Circuit, seeing more than 10 neighboring cities. Access is via Rua 14 de Julho. An unforgettable experience for those who love nature and photography!

fontana-di-trevi.title: Fontana Di Trevi - Serra Negra/SP
fontana-di-trevi.description: Be enchanted by the stunning replica of the Trevi Fountain in Serra Negra! An unmissable tourist spot to take incredible photos and, of course, make that special wish by tossing a coin. Come and see this architectural beauty that brings the charm of Italy to the interior of São Paulo. Visit and fall in love!

teleferico-cristo-redentor.title: Cable Car and Christ the Redeemer
teleferico-cristo-redentor.description: Climb Serra Negra in an exciting way! Take the Cable Car at Praça João Zelante and enjoy a ride with panoramic views of the city. It takes you directly to Christ the Redeemer, at the top of Pico do Fonseca! From up there, the 18-meter statue welcomes you with a spectacular view, perfect for photos and moments of peace. It is the perfect combo of adventure and contemplation!

museu-vinho-cachaca-silotto.title: Wine and Cachaça Museum – Família Silotto
museu-vinho-cachaca-silotto.description: Italian tradition in artisanal wine and cachaça making from a century-old vineyard, with tastings and typical farm products.

vale-ouro-verde-museu-cafe.title: Vale do Ouro Verde – Coffee Museum
vale-ouro-verde-museu-cafe.description: Guided visit through the coffee process from planting to roasting, with a small museum of history and equipment.

sitio-bom-retiro-familia-carra.title: Sítio Bom Retiro – Família Carra – Wines and Spirits
sitio-bom-retiro-familia-carra.description: Artisanal production of grape and orange wines, cachaças, grappa and brandies, plus molasses, rapadura and other farm sweets.

sitio-chapadao-queijos.title: Sítio Chapadão – Cheesemaking
sitio-chapadao-queijos.description: Follow the milk-to-cheese process and taste fresh cheese, ricotta, meia-cura and curd made on the farm.

hero.title: Radio Hotel Serra Negra
hero.subtitle: Tradition, Elegance and Nature
hero.description: Discover a luxury retreat in the heart of Serra Negra, surrounded by lush nature and therapeutic radioactive waters.

slide1.title: Radio Hotel Serra Negra — 80 years
slide1.subtitle: Tradition, elegance and nature
slide1.description: In 2025, Radio Hotel turns 80. The name ‘Radio’ comes from Serra Negra’s famed radioactive waters, known for their therapeutic properties.

slide2.title: Therapeutic Radioactive Waters
slide2.subtitle: Wellness and Relaxation
slide2.description: Enjoy the unique benefits of Serra Negra's radioactive waters, known for their therapeutic and relaxing properties.

slide3.title: Lush Nature
slide3.subtitle: Waterfalls and Trails
slide3.description: Explore the natural beauties of the region, with crystal-clear waterfalls, ecological trails and a stunning view of Serra da Mantiqueira.

about.title: About Radio Hotel
about.description1: Located in the heart of Serra Negra, Radio Hotel combines tradition and elegance in a unique environment, surrounded by the lush nature of Serra da Mantiqueira.
about.description2: For 80 years, we have offered an authentic hospitality experience, with every detail designed to provide unforgettable moments for our guests.

accommodations.title: Comfort and Elegance
accommodations.subtitle: Discover our carefully designed rooms for your perfect stay

standard.name: Standard Room
standard.description: Standard rooms are internal or street-facing and feature thermo-acoustic windows (German technology), a minibar, telephone, and air conditioning, ensuring comfort and silence.

luxury.name: Luxury Suite
luxury.description: Luxury apartments are 8 m² larger than Standard rooms, face the pool, and are equipped with a minibar, telephone, and air conditioning. They have anti-allergenic flooring for greater well-being.

quadruple.name: Quadruple Suite
quadruple.description: Spacious suite with four single beds, ideal for families or groups, with all the amenities for a comfortable stay.

whatsapp.bookingMessage: Hello! I would like to make a reservation at Radio Hotel. Could you help me with availability and rates?

events.title: Conventions
events.subtitle: Unforgettable Moments in a Unique Setting
events.description: Host your dream event in our elegant spaces, surrounded by nature.

planning.title: Personalized Planning
planning.description: Our specialized team takes care of every detail of your event, from planning to execution, ensuring everything is perfect.

convention.title: Convention Center
convention.description: The Radio Hotel Convention Center is ideal for large events, offering 800 m², expandable to 1,200 m², and capacity for up to 350 people. With a 5-meter high ceiling, the space features the Millenium and Monterey auditoriums and 5 modular rooms. It is fully air-conditioned (288,000 BTUs Mitsubishi) and equipped with state-of-the-art technology, including IT resources, internet, multimedia, projection, and DVD, ensuring flexibility and comfort for your event.

corporate.title: Corporate Events
corporate.description: Executive rooms equipped for meetings, training, and business presentations in a professional environment.

wedding.title: Weddings
wedding.description: Celebrate love in a romantic setting surrounded by nature, with lush gardens and panoramic mountain views.

social.title: Social Events
social.description: Birthdays, graduations, and special celebrations in a welcoming and elegant environment.

cta.text: Want to be part of these stories? Book your stay now!

review1.comment: An incredible experience! Radio Hotel exceeded all my expectations. The location is perfect and the service is exceptional.

review2.comment: What a wonderful place! The perfect combination of elegance and nature. I will definitely return!

review3.comment: I loved every moment of my stay. The hotel has a unique atmosphere and the staff is very attentive.

review4.comment: Excellent hotel! From check-in to check-out, everything was perfect. I recommend it to anyone looking for quality and comfort.

review5.comment: A hidden gem in Serra Negra! Radio Hotel offers a premium experience surrounded by nature.
